Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Mark E. Dole to elect to participate in the optional twenty-year retirement plan for police officers employed by the town of Eden in the county of Erie
Summary: Authorizes Mark E. Dole to elect to participate in the optional twenty-year retirement plan for police officers employed by the town of Eden in the county of Erie.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Mark E. Dole to elect to participate in the optional twenty-year retirement plan for police officers employed by the town of Eden in the county of Erie
